name: POP UP Window
short_description:
This script opens A POP-UP-Window automatically the moment a visitor closes a Main-Window. 

If you are a webmaster/blog-master and If you'd like to emphasize something important of the content, use this script. 

This script was written for a blogger. He uses this script at Tumblr, one of his blogs. But many followers of the blogger would like to get this script, so we decided to distribute it. 

- Video "How to Add a POP-UP Window To Your Tumblr Blog." 
http://youtu.be/rYc-r6lWFUQ

== Files == 
- main.html : Main Window 
- sub.html : POP UP Window 

== How to use == 
- Main-Window: Your main content page (eg: blog, service-description) 
- POP-UP-Window: Your sub content page (eg: video, ads, subscription-page) 

== Public Domain ==
This script is usual simple javascript.
And the 2 files are usual html5.
So this package is NOT any creative work.
So this package is completely free. 
NO COPYRIGHT CAUTION REQUIRED.
USE THIS AT YOUR OWN RISK.
